Headline: #115 Pullman/115th Temporary Reroute at 115th/Vincennes
ShortDescription: 115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, 115th, Wentworth, 111th, Halsted & 115th, due to street blockage near 115th/Vincennes.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Michigan, 115th, Wentworth, 111th, Halsted, then resume their normal route on 115th, due to street blockage near 115th/Vincennes.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #79 79th Temporary Reroute at 79th/Cregier
ShortDescription: 79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 79th, Jeffrey, 76th, Stony Island and 79th, due to fire department activity near 79th/Cregier.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 79th, Jeffrey, 76th, Stony Island, then resume their normal route on 79th, due to fire department activity near 79th/Cregier.

Allow extra travel time.
